summary: This is an email chain from August 2020 regarding coordination of victim assistance in the Epstein investigation. It involves FBI Victim Specialists and a DOJ official arranging contact with victims.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Addressed in the initial email forwarding a message about victim assistance coordination.

events.title: Email coordination for victim contact
events.description: An email is forwarded to Sean discussing upcoming contact with victims of Epstein, involving FBI Victim Specialists and a DOJ official.

keyFacts: The email discusses coordination for upcoming contact with victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
An FBI Victim Specialist from the New York Field Office and an FBI Victim Assistance Program Manager from FBIHQ are involved in victim assistance.
A DOJ Associate Deputy Attorney General, who is the National Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking Coordinator, is leading the coordination from DOJ's standpoint.
The communication shows ongoing victim outreach efforts in August 2020, after Epstein's death.
Multiple email addresses and names appear to be redacted or omitted in the provided text.
